SEARCH
Package com.example.indeedgambling

Class Organizer

java.lang.Object
com.example.indeedgambling.Profile
com.example.indeedgambling.Organizer
public class Organizer extends Profile
Represents an Organizer user in the Event Lottery System. An Organizer can create and manage events. This class extends Profile and sets the user role to "organizer". Notes: - Firestore requires a no-argument constructor (included) - roleVerified defaults to false until admin verification

      public Organizer(String profileId, String name, String email, String phone, String passwordHash)
      Creates a new Organizer profile.
      Parameters:
      profileId - Unique profile ID (typically SHA-256 hash of email+password)
      name - Organizer's display name
      email - Organizer email
      phone - Organizer phone number
      passwordHash - SHA-256 hashed password
